definition: a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]

sentences.english: The articulation of the radius and ulna in the arm is a pivot joint.
sentences.chinese: 手臂橈骨和尺骨的連接關節是一個樞軸關節。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical effects of surgical treatment of olecranon fractures using the reconstruction plants.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價重建鋼板治療尺骨鷹嘴骨折的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To reconstruct traumatic or hypoplastic olecranon fossa.
sentences.chinese: 目的再造外傷後畸形或發育不良的尺骨鷹嘴窩。

sentences.english: Objective To report the results of treatment of olecranon fracture combined with anterior dislocation of the elbow by internal fixation.
sentences.chinese: 目的應用內固定治療尺骨鷹嘴骨折合併肘關節前脫位。

sentences.english: A small boneat the junction of the ulna and the carpus.
sentences.chinese: 豌豆骨連接尺骨和腕骨的小骨頭。

sentences.english: The ulna forms the chief articulation at the elbow .
sentences.chinese: 尺骨是組成肘關節的主要骨骼。

sentences.english: Objective To recognize the causes of iatrogenic nonunion of fracture of diaphysis of ulna .
sentences.chinese: 目的認識尺骨骨折術後醫源性骨不連的發生原因。

sentences.english: Methods Ninety four cases of olecranon fracture were treated with external fixators.
sentences.chinese: 目的採用骨外固定器治療尺骨鷹嘴骨折。

sentences.english: Objective To use external fixator in the treatment of fracture of the olecranon of ulna.
sentences.chinese: 目的採用骨外固定器治療尺骨鷹嘴骨折。

definition: metacarpal bone (long bones in the hand and feet)
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
